text: is a Japanese ski jumper. He competed at the 1956 Winter Olympics and the 1960 Winter Olympics. ==References== Category:1931 births Category:Living people Category:Japanese male ski jumpers Category:Japanese male Nordic combined skiers Category:Olympic ski jumpers of Japan Category:Olympic Nordic combined skiers of Japan Category:Ski jumpers at the 1956 Winter Olympics Category:Ski jumpers at the 1960 Winter Olympics Category:Nordic combined skiers at the 1956 Winter Olympics Category:Sportspeople from Hokkaido
title: Koichi Sato (ski jumper)
